body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Michael Diaz and the customer's name is Gloria Jones.  The conversation is about Strolid Motors (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good afternoon! Thank you for calling XYZ Services. My name is Alex. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I need some help with my account. I seem to be having trouble logging in.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m sorry to hear that, Sarah. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. For account verification, could you also provide me with the last four digits of your social security number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The last four digits are seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you, Sarah. I’ve verified your account. Let me reset your login details and guide you through the process. This will only take a moment.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Alex.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah. I've reset your login details. You should be able to access your account now. If you encounter any more issues, feel free to call us back.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sarah. Have a great day!
